content: Dr Alina Miron | Introduction | Brunel University London Skip to Content Home People Dr Alina Miron Dr Alina MironSenior Lecturer (Education) Wilfred Brown Building 201 Email: alina.miron@brunel.ac.uk Tel: +44 (0)1895 268826 Computer Science College of Engineering, Design and Physical Sciences Summary Alina is a lecturer in the Computer Science department and a member of the Intelligent Data Analysis (IDA). Alina has a PhD in machine learning in the field of autonomous vehicles and is an artificial intelligence researcher, developer and educator. Â She has excellent understanding of data, especially real-time data and a strong background in computer vision, natural language processing and data science.
